name: Find shortest Paths from Azure Users to subscription

queryList.query: MATCH (n:AZUser) WITH n MATCH p = shortestPath((n)-[r*1..]->(g:AZSubscription)) RETURN p

name: Find shortest Path from Owned Azure Users to VMs

queryList.query: MATCH (n:AZVM) MATCH p = shortestPath((m:AZUser{owned: true})-[*..]->(n)) RETURN p

name: Find all Paths to Azure KeyVaults from Owned Principals
Find shortest Paths to Azure subscription

queryList.query: MATCH (n:AZSubscription), (m), p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE NOT m=n RETURN p
